column3: News;A tree fell onto cars and caused damage at 3:40 pm on November 26
column4: 2018 along ------Norodom------ Boulevard at the corner of Street 240 in Phnom Penh’s Daun Penh district. Luckily no one was injured.------Authorities later went to work with chainsaws and cut the tree up
column5: freeing the trapped vehicles.------Blame and any compensation claims against the city are unlikely
column7: the owners will probably have to pay for repairs themselves.------Some more pictures here: ------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/43438------
